Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball led the Hornets to a 110-105 win over the Rockets in his first regular-season game since Jan. 26, 2024
Pre-Game Insights: The Hornets are counting on Ball to be on the court a lot more than he has been in recent years as they attempt to end an eight-year playoff drought
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball was all smiles after the game and reflected on being back on the court after his tough stretch saying 'It's blessings, just doing what we love.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets trailed by as many as 18 points before surging late to rally for the victory
Others: First-year coach Charles Lee was asked what a healthy Ball does for his team and he said 'He's like the engine for us.'
